Summary: Biochemical reaction from sulfasalazine to mesalazine.
Biochemical reaction from sulfapyridine to N-acetylsulfapyridine. This interaction is catalyzed by NAT2.
Biochemical reaction from sulfasalazine to sulfapyridine.
Biochemical reaction from mesalazine to N-acetyl-5-aminosalicylic acid. This interaction is catalyzed by NAT1.
Biochemical reaction from sulfapyridine to hydroxysulfapyridine.
Transport from sulfasalazine to sulfasalazine. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCG2.
